body.name: Costa Farms Easy to Grow Live Houseplants (3-Pack), Air Purifying Live Plants in Indoor Garden Plant Pots, Potting Soil, Housewarming, Valentine's Day Gift, Office, Home, or Living Room Decor (3-Pack)
deliveryMessages: $10.55 delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 50 mins
features: CLEANER AIR: Our variety pack of live air purifying plants helps keep your indoor air fresh and clean by naturally filtering out pollutants and toxins. Many indoor plants also act as natural humidifiers, adding moisture in the air so you can breathe better

PERFECT FOR ANY SPACE: Whether you're looking to spruce up your home office or add a touch of greenery to your living room, clean air indoor plants are versatile enough to thrive in any space. Sits beautifully on any desk, windowsill, or tabletop

ELEVATE MOOD & WELLBEING: Plants make us happy. They give us life, fresh air and a sense of calm - all of which have the ability to lift your mood and improve your wellbeing. NASA studies show having plants improves mood, creativity and reduces stress

READY TO GROW: Your new air purifying plants arrive well-packed with care instructions. Keep it happy, healthy, and growing by placing in a bright room and water about once a week. Adjust as needed for your environment

PLANTS MAKE GREAT GIFTS: Plants can be delivered to your loved ones for any occasion, including birthdays, anniversary, and housewarming. Enjoy peace of mind that every plant is well packaged, farm fresh, and ready to impress with your gift message

FRESH FROM FARM: Every plant is packed with care and direct from our farm to your home. Clean Air Plants heights are approximately 8-10 inches tall, measured from the bottom of the pot to the top of the plant. It is in a 4-inch diameter modern decor pot
body.description: Assorted Foliage features assorted, green foliage. These houseplants are great for small spaces. They do well in spaces that have bright, indirect sunlight. Place live plants in a spot that receives bright light. Water plants about once a week with approximately 1/2 cup and be sure all excess water drains away. Adjust as needed for your environment. Do not let the Assorted Foliage sit in water or overly soggy soil. The height at dispatch is approximately 8-inches tall, measured from the bottom of the pot to the top of the plant. The live plants arrive in 4-inch décor pots. To avoid water spillage, this container does not have holes. The live house plants are moderate growers. Exact growth rate depends on the care provided and its environment. Give it a boost during the warm months of Spring and Summer with a general-purpose fertilizer that is formulated for potted plants. Follow the instructions on the fertilizer package for the best use. When the plant out grows the current container, it is time to repot. To repot, gently remove it from its current container and place it into a slightly larger container. Fill in any empty spaces with new and fresh soil and water thoroughly. This plant is considered hardy in USDA Zone 9-11.Be aware of third-party sellers; other companies try to imitate our quality. There are no other authorized Costa Farms sellers. Plants are living things; each one is slightly different, so the plant you receive may vary from the photo. Our growers hand-pick the healthiest and highest-quality plants. We package our plants for delivery with great care so they'll arrive at your home ready to be displayed. Delivered fresh from our farm to you, Costa Farms is passionate about delivering happy, healthy, beautiful plants. Costa Farms plants are not intended for human or animal consumption. Keep out of reach of children and pets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Choose houseplants that help remove toxins from indoor air Clean and freshen the air in your home with this beautiful and healthy collection of houseplants. Studies have shown that live indoor plants can help remove toxins from the air as well as producing oxygen (O2). This collection of leafy air fresheners help beautify your home. Well-packaged for safe arrival to your home, these house plants are a great value. The gorgeous selection of live plants offer vibrant color to your home and are the perfect size for terrariums. The selection of plants come in cute pots that fit any decor. Our vibrant, clean-air houseplants offer a great variety of excellent quality plants that add life to any room. They are also great gifts for any occasion, such as birthdays, graduations, Mother’s Day, teacher gifts, and housewarmings. Clean Air Plants are: Natural air purifiers Live indoor plants Delivered fresh from farm Perfect gifts for any occasion Beautiful indoor home decor Helpful in removing toxins and allergens from indoor air

Natural air purifying plants for any space Facilitates Wellness Live indoor plants help remove toxins from the air as well as produce oxygen (O2). Additionally, studies show that keeping live houseplants in your home helps you feel happier, less stressed, and more relaxed. Plants add positive energy. Beautifies Your Home This collection of living houseplants adds instant life and vibrance to any room. Houseplants mix well in any decor style and come in a wide range of sizes and shapes. Home decor experts cite house plants as an easy way to add instant personality to a room. Excellent Quality Raised by skilled growers on our family-run farm, these leafy live plants are expertly packaged for safe arrival to your door. Just remove them from packaging and enjoy them immediately. Makes a Great Gift Air-cleaning houseplants make ideal gifts, for any occasion. They are especially thoughtful for housewarming gifts. Plants make beautiful (and easy!) gifts: just drop them into a gift bag and they are ready to present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and far better than I can find locally at the moment!
reviews.reviewText: I am a Floridian and I purchase from Costa Farms regularly here at different nurseries and often home depot, but over the years I've found that they are better quality, less expensive, and better cared for when ordering from their Amazon page. I may not be one to go by, especially since 5 to 7 day shipping typically only takes a day for me, but they are always perfection!THIS IS NOT NOT BOX THEY CAME IN! They were packed to prevent any damage and they were all able to breath and came with bamboo to hold each plant in place. I just transferred to this box for photo purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and healthy plants
reviews.reviewText: These plants arrived quickly and packaged so well, that not even a leaf on any one of the plants was damaged. All of the plants are beautiful, lush and healthy. I've already re-potted them into larger containers. Gorgeous! Very happy with my husband's purchase for my Valentine's Day present. Would happily order from Costa Farms again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase for a new plant owner!
reviews.reviewText: I don't have a green thumb at all. I kill every plant I'm ever given but I'm determined to improve my gardening skills because I love how they look in a house and I know they have some air cleaning properties as well.I found this trio of plants and decided to purchase it because 1) the price is great and 2) these plants are known to be good for a healthy home. They arrived in PERFECT condition, packed very well and most important, they're really cute. The pots they arrive in are plastic but they don't look cheap at all. In fact, these would make a great hostess gift or party favor. I appreciated that the seller includes written information about the plants including how to care for them.I've had them for a few weeks now and they are happily thriving and fingers crossed....I haven't killed them yet. I highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Plants came packaged well, delivery sooner than expected. The plants are mostly healthy but definitely a lot of leaf loss on a couple of them. The pothos is gorgeous.Some of the leaves have brown tips or are wilty, hoping they can all recover the transplant-- great value for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a snake plant and in the pictures it shows out of the three plants a snake plant. I’m glad I read the details as it states that plants are selected on what is available. Just to be on the safe side I ended up ordering a snake plant by itself . Plants are beautiful! The description and pictures of the items were accurate. The box was smashed outside, but the plants were packed well inside and thankfully there was no damage to the pots or plants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Order arrived on time and meticulously packed. The plants are absolutely beautiful, and healthy and great size for starters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This definitely wasn't all I expected
reviews.reviewText: Nice small starter plants, I just despise the fact they sent me 2 & 2 of the same plants when it shows 4 variety plants. I now know to definitely just go to the nursery myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Selection but 2 were/are SICK
reviews.reviewText: Plants arrived in a tall box that said KEEP UPRIGHT, that was nice. I opened the box and each plant (6) had paper wrapping secured around each, with a bamboo stake, that was nice. The first pkg I opened, was the first image here, a Rex Begonia. It was clearly in very poor condition, in fact basically dead. I use an app called PictureThis; you take a pic of your plant and up pops all the information about it, its name how to care for it, and so on. The app itself read YOUR PLANT IS SICK .... I set it aside, unwrapped the 2nd plant, 2nd image. That is called Croton. All the plants were tightly wrapped with saran wrap, difficult to get access to the plant itself, all plants had the bamboo stake as mentioned, with the saran wrap wrapped around that too. The Croton was droopy, green leaves laying listless and the soil was dry. Gave it water right away. I could see it is an unusual plant, will be quite pretty when healthy. Went about unwrapping the rest, which were in pretty good condition, although the Golden Pothos (4th and 5th images) is SO root bound you can see the mound of roots sticking OUT of the pot! The 3rd plant/image is called Nerve Plant. The 6th image is a TREE! False Aralia grows 25 - 50 Feet HIGH and approx 7 feet around! It is on the Wild Endangered List and is not expected to survive - that makes this Aralia Tree very special to me. It also is root bound. But I intend on repotting all of them so, not really an issue. The last image is of Satin Pothos and as are the other, it also is quite root bound.For the poor Rex Begonia, I cut everything off, took it out the squashed pot, washed all the dirt away, and found there were actually 5 little plants. I repotted with Coir and Worm Castings and put in my quarantine sick bay. I sincerely hope it comes back to life. I feel the supplier, Costa Farms, should just send me a healthy Rex Begonia! It is a very pretty plant and I would like it for my inside garden.After or when, these plants settle themselves and grow, I'll provide an update. Thank you.
Pour mettre de la vie dans mon nouvel appartement, je voulais acheter des plantes en ligne. Je ne regrette pas mon achat et le recommande !
